title: Outlaw Racing Dual Compound Motorcycle Hand Grips- Half Waffle Design MX Motocross Off Road Dirt Bike Handlebar Grip (Blue)
features: ✅ DURABILITY AND LONGEVITY ARE KEY FOR GREAT BIKE GRIPS- Unlike other gel grips on the market that melt away or become sticky, Outlaw Racing’s motorcycle handlebar grips are long lasting and will remain comfortable and maintain their shape for many seasons.

✅ HALF-WAFFLE GRIPS WITH A UNIQUE AND SMART DESIGN- The Half-waffle grips have a dual compound formulated to achieve the optimum combination of strength, tackiness, and shock absorption that combines the longevity of a firm grip and the feel of a soft compound.

✅ HAVE MORE CONTROL OVER YOUR STEERING AND BIKE- With Outlaw Racing grips you are going to be able to steer the bike with more control because your hand will be gripped firmly to the handlebars. The grips are designed with a ½ diamond surface design & ½ raised waffle design for enhanced grip.

✅ COMFORTABLE & STYLISH GRIP YOU CAN COUNT ON- Outlaw Racing bike grips are designed to keep you comfortable when you must be on the bike for long periods of time. The grips come in three bright, beautiful colors that will add style to any bike. Available in red, orange, blue and black.

✅ YOUR SATISFACTION IS OUR #1 PRIORITY- We take pride in manufacturing motorcycle parts that save you time and money while not compromising on quality. Your safety and performance are what matters most. If you have any questions or concerns about your product, please reach out to us and we would be happy to assist you.
description: If you need new grips for your dirt bike, Outlaw Racing has you covered! You won't be disappointed with the durability and longevity of these grips!
Why Outlaw Racing Grips are the right choice for you:
✅ Designed with a ½ diamond surface design & ½ raised waffle design for enhanced gripping
✅ Have the optimum combination of strength, tackiness, and shock absorption
✅ Suits every riding position and individual riding styles
✅ Comfortable for short and long rides
ADD TO CART FOR A COMFORTABLE & SAFE RIDE!
